item.title: Abandoned shopping trolley, 16th October
item.description:
I am reporting again the abandoned shopping trolley - initial report was closed say could not locate trolley but this is still outside house 4 and 6 Martins road. Please can this be addressed asap as this is a hazard on the footpaths.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martin's Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Henley drive - street lights faulty (69 X 02) (69 05), 16th October
item.description:
Hi Southwark Team, Hope you are well. I recently noticed around 2 street lights have become faulty. I have reported it on FixMyStreet ref: 8191329. Street light post number: 69 X 02 and 69 05 Wanted to bring this to your attention. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Park Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 week Unemptied Bin Problem, 16th October
item.description:
This damaged bin has been overflowing with rubbish for at least 5 weeks. It’s attracting extra littering and fly tipping. I’ve already reported it 3 times via Fix My Street and The Council. Nothing has happened. It’s a mess and is attracting vermin. Please please can you get it sorted ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Village, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
